channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ciena (CIEN) Breaks Record with 1.2 Terabit Wavelength Trial Across 3,050 km Fiber Network
Iran urged to strike Diego Garcia base ‘immediately’
Evacuations ordered as winds pose challenges for firefighters battling California blaze
US FAA closes one of two SpaceX Starship probes as rocket remains grounded
Louisiana voters reject constitutional amendments championed by Republican governor
Florida State Sen. Fine says he doesn't think he disagrees with Trump on anything
item.description: Florida state Sen. Randy Fine said on ABC News Live on Monday that doesn't think be breaks with President Donald Trump on policies.

item.title: 3/31: Face the Nation
item.description: This week on "Face the Nation," as cleanup is underway after Baltimore's Francis Scott Key Bridge collapsed, Ed O'Keefe speaks to Baltimore Mayor Bran...

item.title: 3/31: CBS Mornings Plus
item.description: Widespread storms leave hundreds of thousands without electricity. Also, expert unpacks the $80 million Wisconsin Supreme Court race.

item.title: Wild weather blamed for deaths of 3 kids in Michigan and man in an Amish buggy in Indiana
item.description: Three children died in Michigan after a tree struck their van Sunday as powerful storms swept the region.

item.title: French court finds far-right leader Marine Le Pen guilty in embezzlement case
item.description: A French court has convicted Marine Le Pen of embezzlement and barred her from seeking public office for five years

item.title: Georgia Democrat Lucy McBath suspends 2026 run for governor, citing husband's cancer
item.description: Georgia U.S. Rep. Lucy McBath says she’s suspending her exploratory 2026 bid for governor, casting uncertainty on the Democratic field

item.title: New Mexico GOP targeted in 'horrific' arson attack, officials say
item.description: The New Mexico Republican Party headquarters was targeted in a suspected arson attack on Sunday, according to officials.

item.title: Watch Live: Astronauts who were stuck in space speak out about their mission
item.description: NASA astronauts Butch Wilmore and Sunita Williams, who were stuck in space for more than nine months, are speaking out after their return to Earth.

item.title: Some Egg Beaters and Bob Evans egg substitutes recalled due to bleach
item.description: Some Egg Beaters and Bob Evans egg products have been recalled because they may include a cleaning solution, USDA says.

item.title: Jeffrey Epstein accuser Virginia Giuffre in "a serious accident," rep says
item.description: Virginia Giuffre, who alleged Epstein sexually trafficked her to Britain's Prince Andrew, was in "a serious accident," her representative said.

item.title: Trump again floats possibly seeking 3rd term. The Constitution bars it, scholars say
item.description: "Trump may not want to rule out a third term but the 22nd Amendment to the Constitution does," one expert told ABC News.

item.title: Judge weighs request to withhold investigation records in deaths of Gene Hackman and wife
Evacuations ordered as winds pose challenges for firefighters battling California blaze
